items.sentence: Tom will probably tell Mary he isn\'t tired.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary parked her car.
Tom suddenly realized that he wasn\'t alone.
Mary said she\'d be glad to do that for Tom.
Tom continued giving concerts until he died.
Tom contradicts just about everything I say.
Did you see him at the station this morning?
I had no idea that we had so much in common.
Was it snowing this morning when you got up?
Tom said he doubted that Mary would do that.
Tom said he found something under the couch.
These are clothes that Mary made by herself.
I haven\'t liked anything I\'ve seen so far.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary what he couldn\'t eat.
Tom broke his leg when he fell off the roof.
Tom brought some pictures to show the class.
We\'ve done a lot of stupid things together.
I know that that\'s who you\'re looking for.
Tom wanted Mary to help him clean the house.
Tom was thirteen years old when he met Mary.
